sn55.46:3.1: 46. Suddhakasutta
sn55.46:4.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.46:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.46:5.7: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.46:5.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti.
